DOC.brief_summary: The objective study identify EMR-based clinical covariates quantify association prescribe specific type 2 diabetes ( T2DM ) medication investigation . This include assessment well covariates captured claim data proxy , potential confound comparative research T2DM medication .
DOC.brief_title: Ascertainment EMR-based Clinical Covariates Among Patients Receiving Oral Non-insulin Injected Hypoglycemic Therapy
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Dispensing oral noninsulin inject hypoglycemic medication May 2011 June 2012 Diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus Presence electronic medical record ( EMRbased subset ) Exclusion criterion : Age < 18 T2DM medication initiation Missing ambiguous age sex information At least one diagnosis type 1 diabetes mellitus Less 6 month enrolment database precede date first dispense Prior use index drug
